message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $95. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it, but my budget allows me to spend no more than $85 on this item. Would you consider reducing the price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $85.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not able to meet at $90. I think $87 would be the highest I could go. Would you consider this?
